amendment.description: Amendment requires the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to consider the conduct of any Member, and make a report and recommendation to the House concerning any Member, who is convicted of accepting an illegal foreign contribution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to to require the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to make a report and recommend to the House concerning any Member who is convicted of accepting a foreign campaign contribution. The report may include a recommendation for expulsion.

action.text: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Traficant to the Shays amendment (A002).
Traficant amendment (A030) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A030) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
